formulas.description: On eighth day from the assignment date
formulas.name: OnDayEight
formulas.expression: IF( MOD( {!$Flow.CurrentDate} - DATE(1998, 1, 1), 7) > 3, {!$Flow.CurrentDate} + 9, IF( MOD( {!$Flow.CurrentDate} - DATE(1998, 1, 1), 7) > 2, {!$Flow.CurrentDate} + 10, {!$Flow.CurrentDate} + 11 ) )

formulas.description: On eleventh day from the assignment date
formulas.name: OnDayEleven
formulas.expression: IF( MOD( {!$Flow.CurrentDate} - DATE(2011, 1, 1), 7) > 1, {!$Flow.CurrentDate} + 14, IF( MOD( {!$Flow.CurrentDate} - DATE(2011, 1, 1), 7) > 0, {!$Flow.CurrentDate} + 15, {!$Flow.CurrentDate} + 16 ) )

formulas.description: On fourth day from the assignment date
formulas.name: OnDayFour
formulas.expression: IF( MOD( {!$Flow.CurrentDate} - DATE(2020, 1, 1), 7) > 4, {!$Flow.CurrentDate} + 3, IF( MOD( {!$Flow.CurrentDate} - DATE(2020, 1, 1), 7) > 3, {!$Flow.CurrentDate} + 4, {!$Flow.CurrentDate} + 5 ) )

formulas.description: On fourteenth day from the assignment date
formulas.name: OnDayFourteen
formulas.expression: IF( MOD( {!$Flow.CurrentDate} - DATE(2020, 1, 1), 7) > 4, {!$Flow.CurrentDate} + 17, IF( MOD( {!$Flow.CurrentDate} - DATE(2020, 1, 1), 7) > 3, {!$Flow.CurrentDate} + 18, {!$Flow.CurrentDate} + 19 ) )

formulas.description: On sixth day from the assignment date
formulas.name: OnDaySix
formulas.expression: IF( MOD( {!$Flow.CurrentDate} - DATE(2011, 1, 1), 7) > 1, {!$Flow.CurrentDate} + 7, IF( MOD( {!$Flow.CurrentDate} - DATE(2011, 1, 1), 7) > 0, {!$Flow.CurrentDate} + 8, {!$Flow.CurrentDate} + 9 ) )

formulas.description: On third day from the assignment date
formulas.name: OnDayThree
formulas.expression: IF( MOD( {!$Flow.CurrentDate} - DATE(1998, 1, 1), 7) > 3, {!$Flow.CurrentDate} + 2, IF( MOD( {!$Flow.CurrentDate} - DATE(1998, 1, 1), 7) > 2, {!$Flow.CurrentDate} + 3, {!$Flow.CurrentDate} + 4 ) )

formulas.description: On second day from the assignment date
formulas.name: OnDayTwo
formulas.expression: IF( MOD( {!$Flow.CurrentDate} - DATE(1999, 1, 1), 7) > 1, {!$Flow.CurrentDate} + 1, IF( MOD( {!$Flow.CurrentDate} - DATE(1999, 1, 1), 7) > 0, {!$Flow.CurrentDate} + 2, {!$Flow.CurrentDate} + 3 ) )
